text: - Hiya, I'm Jane Shen.
I am a Customer Delivery Architect.
I'm based out of Toronto, Canada
as part of AWS Professional Services team.
One day my friend called me.
He worked at AWS back in the days.

He said, "We have a role
here at Professional Services
that will really fit you."

So I studied, went through
the interview process.
All of a sudden, I am a Cloud Architect

even though I knew
nothing about the cloud.
I've been here for almost five years.
My title is Customer Delivery Architect.
The title doesn't say all that much
but I think about it as a delivery
and pre-sale rolled into one.
I start working with a customer.
I look at what they want to do.

I ask questions, then I
come up with a solution.
I will scope the effort,

and I'll assist them to
deliver the projects.

The most exciting part of
the job is problem-solving.
Ultimately, we're technical people,

and by looking at different
challenges customers have,

by being able to creatively
solve their problems
using the AWS platform,

that's always the most
interesting part for me.
